body.name: VASAGLE Farmhouse Nightstand with Barn Door, Set of 2, Bedside Table with Storage, Side End Table, Night Stand with Open Compartment, for Bedroom, Rustic White and Honey Brown ULET809K41
features: [Farmhouse All-Rounder] Imbued with rustic hues and the charm of a barn door, these tables bring farmhouse elegance to your space. Their versatility shines as nightstands in the bedroom, side tables, or coffee tables in the living room

[Plenty of Storage] With a spacious tabletop for your lamp or decorations, a cabinet that tucks away odds and ends, and an open compartment for easy access to books or magazines, each end table brings order in, enhancing any space it occupies

[Door on the Right or Left] You can set up the cabinet door to open from the left or right based on your room layout or personal comfort. Whether you're right or left-handed, or dealing with room constraints, this design offers you optimal convenience

[Robust Construction] Constructed from premium MDF, this set of 2 nightstands stands the test of time. With an overall max. load capacity of up to 132 lb, they confidently hold your various bedside essentials

[Stress-Free Assembly] No need to worry about complicated setup. This set of 2 bedside tables comes with clearly marked parts and illustrated instructions to guide you through a hassle-free assembly process

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My only complaint is that they're not as white as I was hoping. With that said, they are very solid. I am so thankful that the top was darker than what the ad stated. I really didn't want golden more of a darker brown. Easy to put together. A lot of good storage and a cute Barn style end table for our living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very well made
reviews.reviewText: great end tables for a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Table
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this little table to use as an end table next to my couch. The table came packaged really well and protected for shipping. However, be prepared, the box was heavy. The directions were clear and easy to follow. Installation was quick and easy and it only took me about half an hour to complete by myself. All the pieces needed were there and they even gave extras just in case. The table is small I think for the price, but I suppose its big enough to do what its made for. It's pretty sturdy, but not like a real wood end table. I would be very careful about putting drinks and such on it. Not sure it would hold up well to any type of moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rustic Charm and Practicality
reviews.reviewText: As a lover of rustic décor and farmhouse aesthetics, the Farmhouse Nightstand with Barn Door has become the focal point of my bedroom, combining style and functionality in one exquisite piece of furniture.Authentic Farmhouse Design:From its distressed finish to its charming barn door design, this nightstand exudes authentic farmhouse charm. The weathered look adds character and warmth to my bedroom, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere reminiscent of a country cottage.Barn Door Convenience:The standout feature of this nightstand is undoubtedly its barn door, which adds a touch of nostalgia and whimsy to the design. Not only does it enhance the visual appeal of the nightstand, but it also serves a practical purpose by concealing the storage compartment, keeping clutter out of sight and maintaining a neat and organized space.Ample Storage Space:Despite its compact size, this nightstand offers ample storage space to keep bedside essentials within easy reach. The interior shelf behind the barn door provides a convenient spot for books, magazines, or electronic devices, while the top surface accommodates a lamp, alarm clock, and other decorative accents.Sturdy Construction:Crafted from high-quality materials, this nightstand is built to last. The sturdy construction ensures stability and durability, while the smooth-gliding barn door mechanism operates quietly and effortlessly, adding to the overall functionality of the piece.Easy Assembly:Assembling this nightstand was a breeze, thanks to the clear instructions and intuitive design. With just a few simple steps, I had it put together in no time, ready to enhance the look and functionality of my bedroom.In summary, the Farmhouse Nightstand with Barn Door seamlessly blends rustic charm with practicality, making it a standout addition to any bedroom décor. Whether you're drawn to its farmhouse-inspired design or its functional storage features, this nightstand is sure to elevate the style and functionality of your bedside space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The stands are wobbly and no matter what we did they won't tighten up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality and Looks Nice
reviews.reviewText: I am using this VASAGLE Farmhouse Nightstand as a nightstand and it looks great next to my bed. Pretty easy to assemble, like any IKEA furniture and it comes with everything you will need within the assembly kit. The detail with this nightstand is wonderful, the shelf area below the table top is a nice storage spot to put the things you would like to get at quickly. The barn door compartment has plenty of space and it’s nice to be able to close the door to help keep the items hidden. I like that you can choose which direction you would like to door to open. Overall, for the price, this is a nice, solid nightstand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits the "barn" theme of my house perfectly. I personally love the unique color and it is quite sturdy. Did not take too long to assemble. Really like how I can stick a bunch of stuff inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The nighstand just look beautiful...If you do like farmhouse style...
reviews.reviewText: With dimensions of 15.7" x 17.7" x 23.6", this nighstand is quite small for its price. If I say that it's the best value, I would not feel I'm being honest considering that besides being small, do not offer any other conveniences such as USB ports nor AC outlets. However, once assembled, it looks beautiful! I just love the look of the "crossed slats" that characterize farmhouse style furniture.
